name: places/ChIJZeeSwk_3wokRu__o6SizXRA
adrFormatAddress: 2637 Broadway, New York, NY 10025-5022, USA

originalText.text: As a pediatric provider myself and a parent of two small kids, I can say with certainty I’ve yet to encounter a better run office on every level. From the front to the back, every encounter is pleasant at worst and very warm at best. Each provider brings their own approach to the visit, but all are attentive, responsive, bright and supportive. They are a staple of the neighborhood and community.

originalText.text:
I can't speak highly enough of Dr. Nowell and her pediatric office. Dr. Nowell has been my daughter's primary care physician since the day she was born. I couldn't be more grateful to have her as our family's trusted healthcare provider. Dr. Nowell embodies all the qualities one could hope for in a doctor - she's kind, considerate, and incredibly knowledgeable. She consistently goes above and beyond to address any questions or concerns we may have.

In addition to Dr. Nowell, the entire staff at the pediatric office is nothing short of amazing. They are exceptionally patient, friendly, and highly organized, making each visit a pleasant and efficient experience.

Recently, my daughter started school, and I needed certain forms and records promptly. With just one quick phone call to the office, I was pleasantly surprised to receive an email with the necessary documents in less than 15 minutes. This level of efficiency and responsiveness truly sets Dr. Nowell's pediatric office apart.

I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Nowell and her team to any parent seeking exceptional pediatric care. Their commitment to patient well-being and exceptional service make them a standout choice for families needing a dedicated and caring healthcare provider.

originalText.text: Dr Hoffman and her team are amazing! We have been working with her for the past 5.5 years. She has helped us through some extremely challenging times with our 6-year-old daughter. She is kind, patient, and incredibly smart. We recently moved to NJ, and we still drive in to see Dr Hoffman. Our 1-year-old daughter now goes to her too :)

originalText.text: We went to MVP since my 2.5 year old was a newborn. I cannot say enough wonderful things about their practice. I felt so comfortable with Dr.Hoffman especially, but loved all the providers we saw. They are understanding, prompt, and responsive. I would recommend MVP to any parent!

text.text: We went to MVP since my 2.5 year old was a newborn. I cannot say enough wonderful things about their practice. I felt so comfortable with Dr.Hoffman especially, but loved all the providers we saw. They are understanding, prompt, and responsive. I would recommend MVP to any parent!

originalText.text: My family has moved several times over the last fifteen years. It has been difficult to keep track of my girls’ vaccine records. Manhattan Valley Pediatrics (MVP) called my former doctors’ offices, retrieved necessary information (with my permission) and compiled everything in one place. Jamie went above and beyond for us! We have been seeing Dr.Nowell for five years now. We loved her at West Care so much that we followed her to MVP. She is warm, welcoming and wise. She has taken the time to get to know my girls individually in order to provide thoughtful, valuable advice. We are so grateful for the entire staff at MVP!
